abstract: WestLB Mellon Asset Management suspended redemptions of an asset-backed securities fund amid investor concern about the problems in the subprime mortgage market.
snippet: WestLB Mellon Asset Management suspended redemptions of an asset-backed securities fund amid investor concern about the problems in the subprime mortgage market.
lead_paragraph: WestLB Mellon Asset Management suspended redemptions of an asset-backed securities fund yesterday amid investor concern about the problems in the subprime mortgage market in the United States.

headline.main: German Fund Stops Payouts, Citing Mortgage Market Unease
headline.print_headline: German Fund Stops Payouts, Citing Mortgage Market Unease
